1.0.name: wordpress/disable-blogroll-and-footer-text
1.0.description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: As soon as you click on actuvate plugin, it show an error: "The plugin generated 168 characters of unexpected output during activation. If you notice headers already sent messages, problems with syndication feeds or other issues, try deactivating or removing this plugin." This is not actually an error and will be overcomed in the next release. It will not affect your website in any way. TESTED.

This plugin is useful if you want to hide the name of the designers of theme. This will also remove the blogroll.

If you find this useful then please consider making a donation so that I can continue working on furthur developments :) Please go hee to donate http://mobarena.co.in/donate/

Regards Aman704 MobArena
